definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: Eg. The house on the hill overlooks the village.
sentences.chinese: 从小山上的房子可以俯视村庄。

sentences.english: Boys and girls go out together from an early age.
sentences.chinese: 美国的男孩和女孩从小就可以一块出去玩。

sentences.english: Yang Yun, her son, in his childhood, liked reading his grandfather's unopened manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 其外孙杨恽从小爱读外公这部尚未公开的书稿。

sentences.english: I was a nervous child, and when I grew, I was a nervous young man.
sentences.chinese: 我从小胆小怯弱，长大了，仍是一个胆怯的年轻人。

sentences.english: His family was very poor, but he worked hard at his studies even in early childhood.
sentences.chinese: 孔子的家里很穷，但是他从小就认真读书，刻苦学习。

sentences.english: We have listened to Danish and spoken it from childhood. It is the joy of recognition we experience.
sentences.chinese: 我们从小就听说丹麦语，这是我们经历认同感的快乐。

sentences.english: I am a F. 5 student who is so fond of keeping pets.
sentences.chinese: 本人是一名中五学生，从小对饲养宠物有浓厚兴趣。

sentences.english: The love which my parents gave me , or the lovely family I am having.
sentences.chinese: 父母从小对我无私的痛爱，他们的和谐家庭氛围。

sentences.english: They all had, since their childhoods, a common dream and goal --- return to Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 他们从小有个共同的梦想和目标，就是回到上海。

sentences.english: People grow up aware of the value of counting calories.
sentences.chinese: 人们从小到大也非常注意计算食物的热量。

sentences.english: Eggs are graded from small to extra - large.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋从小的到特大的分成了等级。

sentences.english: The male lead SooHo looses his mother as a child and lives with his father.
sentences.chinese: 男主人公才河从小失去了母亲，与父亲一起生活。

sentences.english: Dad, I since the childhood to you are filled with hate, I hate you the flip-side of bad temper.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸我从小对你充满怨恨，我讨厌你那暴躁的坏脾气。

sentences.english: My grandmamma told me when she was born she was a Christian.
sentences.chinese: 我的奶奶告诉我，她从小就是基督徒。

sentences.english: They had been indoctrinated from an early age with their parents' beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 他们从小就被满脑子灌入他们父母的信仰。

definition: to be born of/to come from/family background/class origin
to be orphaned of one's father
to have lost both one's parents
